channel.title: Flutter on A.H. SamadiPour
channel.description: Recent content in Flutter on A.H. SamadiPour

item.title: My First International Project
item.description: Story As an Iranian, I can’t work with other countries every day. Some won’t accept my nationality! Even if they accept it, there are many problems when it comes to payment! you might wonder well it’s not a hard thing but believe me when I say it. It’s too damn HARD! But anyway, let me tell the story.
